resources.string: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of the Forest Spider and 1 copy of the Old Forest Road, and add them to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
Setup: Take out Ungoliants Spawn and set him out of play
When all Pogress tokens have been placed on this card, put Ungoliants Spawn into play. Players cannot defeat this stage whilst Ungoliants Spawn is in play
Setup: Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck, and adds it to the staging area.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 Hill Troll (if one is not already in play), and place it in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Each player searches the encounter deck for the first Orc card and places it into the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Players cannot defeat this stage while there are Orc cards in play.
